Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_nbm4ibTEYM1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/0df0780c01cd550eaa64a0e14689413f/tumblr_inline_nbm4mndR971rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>On the days you just don’t feel like flying, there’s nothing better than listening to the purr of your engines and getting set to burn rubber wherever you may.</p>

<p><strong>TouhouTorpedo</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1w9DRRt"><strong>MODULAR MULTIWHEELS 7</strong> </a>gives you plenty of ways to pimp your ride with tweakable wheels and placeable engines with multiple fuel types. Immediate access to heavy truck parts? Wheels with dynamic friction? They’re in there, too. Those and much more.</p>

<p>Go <a href="http://bit.ly/1w9DRRt"><strong>HERE</strong></a> to have a full look at Modular MultiWheels 7.</p>

<p></p>
Great to see TouhouTorpedo modding again, welcome back and congrats on being featured!
OOH SIHINY! Great to see this back!
They look great but I think I'm going to avoid getting hooked on these. Sorry to say it but I'm not ready to trust the author to not rip the rug out from under us again at this time.
Out of interest, when in the day are these posted, Squad time?

Out of interest, when in the day are these posted, Squad time?

I believe these were posted at 10:00 PM Squad time. Not entirely sure though.

I believe these were posted at 10:00 PM Squad time. Not entirely sure though.

This one was. But really they are posted whenever they are posted Squad time. I've seen them posted mid-afternoon and I've seen them posted nearing midnight. (I'm in the same technical timezone as Squad)
